name: European Regional Aerodromes Community (ERAC)
goal:
The association’s aim is to support and represent the interests of its international and national member associations in the development and implementation of aerodrome (ADR) and air traffic management (ATM) related regulations and policies in Europe.

The member associations themselve are representing 145 (spring 2012) aerodromes and air navigation service provider.
interests: Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Sustainable future for GA
Review regulation 216/2008
review guideline on state aid for aviation
white paper aviation
